title: Anderson Valley Brewing Beer Dinner
description:
Take a seat for a night of brews and bites during our 2nd Beer Dinner of the season! June 27th's four course dinner with feature beer pairings from Anderson Brewing Company. Seating is limited so snag your $50 ticket today!

View the Menu >>
short_description: Take a seat for a night of brews and bites during our 2nd Beer Dinner of the season! June 27th's four course dinner with feature beer pairings from Anderson Brewing Company.
